site_name.description: This is a required setting, and should be a string that is used as the main title for the project documentation

site_url.description: Set the canonical URL of the site. This will add a link tag with the canonical URL to the generated HTML header

repo_url.description: When set, provides a link to your repository (GitHub, Bitbucket, GitLab or etc) on each page

repo_name.description: When set, provides the name for the link to your repository on each page

edit_uri.description: Path from the base repo_url to the docs directory when directly viewing a page, accounting for specifics of the repository host, the branch, and the docs directory itself

site_description.description: Set the site description. This will add a meta tag to the generated HTML header

site_author.description: Set the name of the author. This will add a meta tag to the generated HTML header

copyrigh.description: Set the copyright information to be included in the documentation by the theme

google_analytics.description: Set the Google analytics tracking configuration

remote_branch.description: Set the remote branch to commit to when using gh-deploy to deploy to Github Pages, This option can be overridden by a command line option in gh-deploy

remote_name.description: Set the remote name to push to when using gh-deploy to deploy to Github Pages

nav.description: This setting is used to determine the format and layout of the global navigation for the site

theme.description: Sets the theme and theme specific configuration of your documentation site

docs_dir.description: The directory containing the documentation source markdown files

site_dir.description: The directory where the output HTML and other files are created

extra_css.description: Set a list of CSS files in your docs_dir to be included by the theme

extra_javascript.description: Set a list of JavaScript files in your docs_dir to be included by the theme

extra_templates.description: Set a list of templates in your docs_dir to be built by MkDocs

extra.description: A set of key value pairs, where the values can be any valid YAML construct, that will be passed to the template

use_directory_urls.description: This setting controls the style used for linking to pages within the documentation

dev_addr.description: Determines the address used when running mkdocs serve

markdown_extensions.description: MkDocs uses the Python Markdown library to translate Markdown files into HTML. Python Markdown supports a variety of extensions that customize how pages are formatted

plugins.description: A list of plugins with optional configuration settings to use when building the site

prebuild_index.description: Optionally generates a pre-built index of all pages, which provides some performance improvements for larger sites

search.description: A search plugin is provided by default with MkDocs which uses lunr.js as a search engine

separator.description: A regular expression which matches the characters used as word separators when building the index

lang.description: A list of languages to use when building the search index as identified by their ISO 639-1 language codes
